background_context: 29-year-old former founder who raised money, built fast, crashed hard
motivations: to regain control of my life
to create from a place of peace
fears: that i’m too burned to start again
that maybe i was never that good
worldview: the game is rigged in some places — but not all. if you know yourself, you can find a way out
user_notes: wants to help other founders avoid similar failures, but questions the motivation
